title: Warning of Caution for Risk Assets, Ghosn’s 5,400 Mile Escape
itunes:title: Warning of Caution for Risk Assets, Ghosn’s 5,400 Mile Escape
description:
Bloomberg News Cleantech and Renewables Reporter Chris Martin discusses the billion dollar solar plant that was obsolete before it ever went online. Bloomberg Markets Senior Editor John Authers talks about a warning of caution for risk assets in the new year. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, breaks down why the killing of Soleimani is a blow to economically struggling Iran. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Reporter Matthew Campbell walk through Carlos Ghosn's 5,400 mile escape to Beirut. And we Drive to the Close with Henley Smith, Senior Relationship Manager at Stone Castle Cash Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
